shortAboutMe: Hey! This is Alejandro Cristancho. My passion is  finding solutions and learning how they are created!
textAboutMe: I am a final year university student, characterized by discipline, teamwork, persistence, and curiosity to learn and improve my skills. My experience is based on various types of projects and university courses in which I have achieved excellent performance. I have also taken self-taught courses on online platforms.

characteristicsObject.title: Versatile Framework Proficiency
characteristicsObject.text: I have had the opportunity to work with several frontend frameworks, libraries and CSS preprocessors.

characteristicsObject.title: Willingness to learn
characteristicsObject.text: I enjoy the opportunity to explore new horizons particularly Blockchain, cloud computing, and design patterns - Figma.

projectsobject.title: Gistura
projectsobject.desc: System created to facilitate the search and promotion of cultural events in the Antioquia.

projectsobject.title: Icocinema
projectsobject.desc: System created to reduce the time spent by cinema users when booking a movie.

projectsobject.title: Onboarding platform
projectsobject.desc: (Integration project with a company) Useful system for onboarding new personnel, providing mainly company information, key topics, and concepts for their work.

projectsobject.title: Personal Portfolio
projectsobject.desc: Website developed as a personal goal with the aim of creating a business card for alejandrocristm.

projectsobject.title: NFT Marketplace
projectsobject.desc: (Integration project with a company) Project for buying and selling NFTs, integrating smart contracts and blockchain technologies.
